testcase.name: Given a Valid Category when call update then return category updated
Given a Valid True isActive when call new Category Deactivate then return category inactive
Given an invalid empty name when call new Category then should return error
Given an invalid name length less than 3 when call new Category then should return error
Given a valid params when call new Category then instantiate a category
Given a Valid False isActive when call new Category Activate then return category activate
Given an invalid null name when call new Category then should return error
Given a Valid Category when call update to inactive then return category updated
Given an invalid name greather than 255 when call new Category then should return error
